definition: to open an aperture/(extended meaning) to cut a way through/to open up a road
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]

sentences.english: Sima Qian visualized this feat as blazing the path into the west regions.
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷把這一歷史性的壯舉形象地描繪爲“鑿空”。

sentences.english: Someone had hollowed out a large block of stone.
sentences.chinese: 有人把一大塊石頭給鑿空了。
